title: A letter to A.H. Esq., concerning the stage
author: Hopkins, Charles, 1664?-1700?
notes: A defense of the stage, in answer to Jeremy Collier's Short view of the immorality and profaneness of the English stage.
"The initials in the title [i.e. A.H.] have been identified as those of Anthony Hammond. Charles Hopkins has been suggested as the probable author." Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
